title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-1.6 - Physical facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-1.6 - Physical facilities

State Regulations

No specimen shall be examined unless the portion of the laboratory premises and the equipment used therein have been approved by the department as adequate for proper performance of the type of tests for which the laboratory is authorized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
58-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
